dcterms:creator: E. Sharma
C. Li
L. Wang
dcterms:description: BIGPATENT is a large-scale patent document summarization dataset with an average input of 3572.8 words and a reference with average length of 116.5 words. It is a highly abstractive summarization dataset with salient content evenly distributed in the input.
dcterms:title: BIGPATENT

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
M. Lapata
dcterms:description: WikiSUM is a large-scale multi-document summarization dataset where the generation of lead Wikipedia sections is treated as an MDS task. The dataset consists of multiple paragraphs ranked based on their titles to select top-40 paragraphs as source input.
dcterms:title: WikiSUM
